title: Remove dhcp option and fix arp-broadcast bug
body:
This PR does a few things:
1. Removes dhcp option in the network resource that was supposed to have been removed earlier with the deprecation of the network fields.
2. Removes associated tests that no longer make sense to run.
3. Fixes corner case in arpbroad-cast code.


I have re-run tests o...
